title: Mac loading issues
body: So this has actually been a problem for me in the past few months in that it takes forever for league to log me in to the actual game. It used to not do that but I have to wait about 5 minutes to actually get into the clickable client when i can hear my friends' invites in the background. I've repaired the client twice and restarted my computer, but none of those seemed to fix the issue. i can't even get in right now as I'm typing this haha. is there a solution out there yet or?

replies.body:
That's a really odd delay!  I'd bet that a connection issue might be causing some of these hiccups, so it wouldn't hurt to try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.

If that doesn't help though, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look and work with you individually on this.
